text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires mentioning the limitation of the TDM exception by stating it only applies to non-commercial research/analysis. The candidate answer explicitly states this under section 2.A: 'The UK has a limited exception for TDM (s.29A CDPA 1988), but it only applies to non-commercial research or private study.
